content.rendered:
I randomly put together all of these ingredients yesterday and fell in LOVE! It’s sweet and refreshing.

What you will need:

-3/4 cup coconut milk

-1 cup of frozen mangos, peaches, and carrots all cut up. (1 cup of ALL together, not each separately)

-1 banana (frozen or not)

-touch of organic agave

-handful of ice

 

-Throw in all the fruit!

 

-Splash in the coconut milk, agave and ice!

-Blend it up!

 

Enjoy!!!!!
